metadata.title: CVE-2025-24150 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of files. This issueis fixed in macOS Sequoia 15.3, Safari 18.3, iOS 18.3 and iPadOS 18.3.Copying a URL from Web Inspector may lead to command injection.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
